participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and optimistic, with a passion for music and cars.
participant_1.background: I'm proud of my ability to enjoy my free time. I have a wonderful family and they are always supportive of my music store and my love for Harry Potter. I am a barista. I am moving to be closer to my favorite pasta restaurant. I lost my favorite 80s cassette tape in a fire.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and creative, with a love for vintage cars and photography.
participant_2.background: My vintage cars are my pride and joy. I like rap music. I like taking pictures. I am 25 years old and live with my parents. I am dumpy.

content.text: Hey how are you?
I'm doing well! How about yourself?
I am good as well! I was just reading about your vintage cars. I love old cars!
Thanks! Me too! I have a 1969 Ford Mustang that I've been restoring for a few years now.
Wow that's awesome! I love Mustangs. My favorite car is a 1967 Shelby GT500.
That's a great car! I've always wanted one of those.
Maybe you can trade me your Mustang for mine 😉
Haha I don't think I'm ready to give up my Mustang just yet.
No worries! I understand. I'm not ready to give up my Shelby either.
What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different types of music, but my favorite is rap.
I like rap too! What are some of your favorite artists?
I like Kendrick Lamar, J. Cole, and Drake.
I love Kendrick Lamar! He's one of my favorites too.
Yeah he's great! I'm excited for his new album.
Me too! I'm sure it's going to be amazing.
I'm sure it will be too. Do you have any hobbies?
I like taking pictures. I'm not very good at it, but I enjoy it.
That's cool! I like taking pictures too. I'm not very good at it either, but I like to do it.
It's fun to take pictures of things you like.
Yeah it is
